title: Secluded Mykonos Cyclades-Chic Sanctuary with Cliffside Infinity Pool near Elia Beach
description: At the height of Mykonos’ sun-soaked majesty stands Myconian Panoptis Escape, a blissful sanctuary that’s backed by unmatched hospitality, a profound soulfulness and unrestricted views of the endlessly dazzling Aegean Sea. Spend your days lazing by the hotel’s cactus-flanked seawater infinity pool or on nearby Elia Beach’s free-spirited sands, savouring moments spent in spectacular waters before returning to your extraordinary boutique villa. The evenings are caressed by the sea breeze and perfectly matched with a visit to Myconian Panoptis Escape’s top-notch restaurant, serving local-caught fish and sizzling Mediterranean plates elevated by views over endless seas and starry skies.
